description.desktop: Brand your links with custom sub-domains or full domains that let your fans recognize your campaigns.
Enjoy the flexibility to add any custom store to your links, like your merch store, with custom logos and icons.
Feature.fm has the fastest page load speeds in the market, helping fans get to your music faster.

getStartedSection.title: Get started for free
getStartedSection.descr:
You can use Feature.fm for free or subscribe to one of our paid plans.

All paid plans come with a free trial of our Pro plan

solutionsSection.label: Artist Bio Links
solutionsSection.title: A single link that connects fans to all of your content
solutionsSection.descr: A Link in Bio made for music. Connect fans to your latest release, video, merch, tour, website, press coverage from all of your social media bios. Add any button type you need:

solutionsSection.label: Release Links
solutionsSection.title: The fastest way for fans to consume your music
solutionsSection.descr: A smart music link that automatically routes fans to your released music in the services they already use and tracks everything you need to grow your streams.
advantages: Automatically finds your music in popular services
Convert your pre-release music links automatically on release day
Customize by country with geo-aware links and language localization

solutionsSection.label: Pre-Save Links
solutionsSection.title: Build hype and maximize your streams on release day
solutionsSection.descr: Market your music to fans ahead of your release date. Get fans to Pre-Save your music and guarantee streams, follows and playlist adds from day one.
advantages: Your music saved automatically on release day
Grow artist follows and playlist additions in one click

solutionsSection.label: Tour Links
solutionsSection.title: Sell more tickets to shows
solutionsSection.descr: A Link in Bio made for music. Connect fans to your latest release, video, merch, tour, website, press coverage from all of your social media bios. Add any button type you need:
advantages: Quickly add your tour dates by importing shows from Bandsintown
Keep loyal fans up to date on your show schedule

solutionsSection.label: Podcast Links
solutionsSection.title: Drive listeners to your Podcast
solutionsSection.descr: Automated Smart Podcast Links connect listeners to your podcast in their favorite audio platform.
advantages: Your music saved automatically on release day
Grow artist follows and playlist additions in one click

solutionsSection.label: Contests
solutionsSection.title: Reward your most loyal fans with contests and giveaways
solutionsSection.descr: Build fan loyalty with easy-to-create contests that reward your fans with prizes and encourage additional entries for taking actions of your choice.
advantages: Supercharge your growth with music-focused actions
